ValidationRule.description: If pcplang_c is set to “Other,” then pcplangdesc_c must be filled in to describe the language. This validation fires only if the current time is greater than or equal to Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c <= NOW(), ISPICKVAL(pcplang__c, 'Other'), ISBLANK(pcplangdesc__c), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Provider' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please input the provider’s other language.
